none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 20, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
It's like future wave DEVO by way of space age thru new wave music. Something that's completely familiar and still weird as shit, something that you super want to know but you feel like you already know....with guitar ripped straight from late '80s 120 Minutes and FALCO through an effects box caliber vocals. CRUSADER DE DEUS are fukkn weird, even though you've heard everything that they do.....you've just heard it all in different bands and in different decades. Now, you can hear it all the same time.  CLÁSSICOS REPUBLICANOS
https://crusaderdedeus.bandcamp.com/

seo.title: Crusader De Deus - Clássicos Republicanos - Terminal Escape
